analysis.description:
Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x5cca9de0ff49a45124880ebce6391e73418a48fd.sol#110-120) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/37/0x5cca9de0ff49a45124880ebce6391e73418a48fd.sol#119-120)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/37/0x5cca9de0ff49a45124880ebce6391e73418a48fd.sol#50:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x5cca9de0ff49a45124880ebce6391e73418a48fd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x5cca9de0ff49a45124880ebce6391e73418a48fd.sol#1): it allows old versions
